trends.title: AI journalism startup Symbolic.ai signs deal with Rupert Murdoch’s News Corp
trends.summary: The startup claims its AI platform can help optimize editorial processes and research.

trends.title: AI video startup, Higgsfield, founded by ex-Snap exec, lands $1.3B valuation
trends.summary: Higgsfield says it's on a $200 million annual revenue run rate. So it opened its previous Series A round back up and sold another $80 million in shares.

trends.title: OpenAI invests in Sam Altman’s brain computer interface startup Merge Labs
trends.summary: Merge Labs is a “research lab” dedicated to “bridging biological and artificial intelligence to maximize human ability.” OpenAI wrote the largest check in Merge Labs' $250 million seed round at an $850 million valuation.

trends.title: The AI lab revolving door spins ever faster
trends.summary: AI labs just can't get their employees to stay put. Yesterday’s big AI news was the abrupt and seemingly acrimonious departure of three top executives at Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines lab.

trends.title: Taiwan to invest $250B in US semiconductor manufacturing
trends.summary: The U.S. struck a trade deal with Taiwan as the country looks to help boost domestic semiconductor manufacturing.

trends.title: The US imposes 25% tariff on Nvidia’s H200 AI chips headed to China
trends.summary: The Trump administration formalized its 25% cut of H200 chip sales in China with a tariff that applies to certain semiconductors.

trends.title: Wikimedia Foundation announces new AI partnerships with Amazon, Meta, Microsoft, Perplexity, and others
trends.summary: The AI partnerships allow companies to access the org's content, like Wikipedia, at scale.

trends.title: Parloa triples its valuation in 8 months to $3B with $350M raise
trends.summary: The massive round was led by existing investor General Catalyst, with participation from other returning backers.

trends.title: Generative AI tool helps 3D print personal items that sustain daily use
trends.summary: “MechStyle” allows users to personalize 3D models, while ensuring they’re physically viable after fabrication, producing unique personal items and assistive technology.

trends.title: 3 Questions: How AI could optimize the power grid
trends.summary: While the growing energy demands of AI are worrying, some techniques can also help make power grids cleaner and more efficient.

trends.title: MIT scientists investigate memorization risk in the age of clinical AI
trends.summary: New research demonstrates how AI models can be tested to ensure they don’t cause harm by revealing anonymized patient health data.

trends.title: Guided learning lets “untrainable” neural networks realize their potential
trends.summary: CSAIL researchers find even “untrainable” neural nets can learn effectively when guided by another network’s built-in biases using their guidance method.

trends.title: US senators demand answers from X, Meta, Alphabet, and others on sexualized deepfakes
trends.summary: In a letter to the leaders of X, Meta, Alphabet, Snap, Reddit, and TikTok, several U.S. senators are demanding the companies provide proof that they have "robust protections and policies" in place, and how they plan to curb the rise of sexualized deepfakes on their platforms.

trends.title: After Italy, WhatsApp excludes Brazil from rival chatbot ban
trends.summary: WhatsApp is allowing AI providers to continue offering their chatbots to users in Brazil, days after the country's competition agency ordered the company to suspend its new policy that bars third-party, general-purpose chatbots from the app.

trends.title: At MIT, a continued commitment to understanding intelligence
trends.summary: With support from the Siegel Family Endowment, the newly renamed MIT Siegel Family Quest for Intelligence investigates how brains produce intelligence and how it can be replicated to solve problems.

trends.title: Decoding the Arctic to predict winter weather
trends.summary: With the help of AI, MIT Research Scientist Judah Cohen is reshaping subseasonal forecasting, with the goal of extending the lead time for predicting impactful weather.

trends.title: Stone Center on Inequality and Shaping the Future of Work Launches at MIT
trends.summary: Recent launch event for the center featured discussions on pro-worker AI, wealth inequality, and the future of liberal democracy.

trends.title: Using design to interpret the past and envision the future
trends.summary: MIT graduate student C Jacob Payne reimagines historic architecture and invents new possibilities at the intersection of AI and design.

trends.title: MIT in the media: 2025 in review
trends.summary: MIT community members made headlines with key research advances and their efforts to tackle pressing challenges.

trends.title: A new way to increase the capabilities of large language models
trends.summary: MIT-IBM Watson AI Lab researchers developed an expressive architecture that provides better state tracking and sequential reasoning in LLMs over long texts.
